mapper.sql: PKID, BILLID, PAYNOTESCODE, TOTALAMT, PRINTDATE, PAYER, AGENTBANK, PAYERDEPT, CHECKCODE, RECMETHOD, REMARK, CREATETIME, CREATER, PAYERBANK, PAYERBANKACCT, PERFORMDEPT, PAYMETHOD, NOTESCODE, BANKRECDATE, BANKACCTDATE, NOTESKIND, ISPREAUDIT, RECFEEFLAG, PAYFEEMETHOD, PROGRAM, UNITS, AMOUNT, STANDARD, AMT, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_DATE, AREACODE, PROCESSSTATUS, CREATERNAME, PRFRMDEPTNAME, PROGRAMNAME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from FS_PAYMENTINFO
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
insert into FS_PAYMENTINFO (PKID, BILLID, PAYNOTESCODE, TOTALAMT, PRINTDATE, PAYER, AGENTBANK, PAYERDEPT, CHECKCODE, RECMETHOD, REMARK, CREATETIME, CREATER, PAYERBANK, PAYERBANKACCT, PERFORMDEPT, PAYMETHOD, NOTESCODE, BANKRECDATE, BANKACCTDATE, NOTESKIND, ISPREAUDIT, RECFEEFLAG, PAYFEEMETHOD, PROGRAM, UNITS, AMOUNT, STANDARD, AMT, VERSION, CREATED_BY, CREATED_DT, LAST_UPD_BY, LAST_UPD_DATE, AREACODE, PROCESSSTATUS, CREATERNAME, PRFRMDEPTNAME, PROGRAMNAME ) values (#{pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{printdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recmethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payerbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payerbankacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{paymethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{notescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankrecdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankacctdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteskind,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ispreaudit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recfeeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payfeemethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{program,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{standard,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update FS_PAYMENTINFO
PKID = #{record.pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BILLID = #{record.billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYNOTESCODE = #{record.paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TOTALAMT = #{record.totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRINTDATE = #{record.printdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYER = #{record.payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENTBANK = #{record.agentbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYERDEPT = #{record.payerdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHECKCODE = #{record.checkcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECMETHOD = #{record.recmethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{record.creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYERBANK = #{record.payerbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYERBANKACCT = #{record.payerbankacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PERFORMDEPT = #{record.performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYMETHOD = #{record.paymethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NOTESCODE = #{record.notescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKRECDATE = #{record.bankrecdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANKACCTDATE = #{record.bankacctdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTESKIND = #{record.noteskind,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISPREAUDIT = #{record.ispreaudit,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECFEEFLAG = #{record.recfeeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAYFEEMETHOD = #{record.payfeemethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROGRAM = #{record.program,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNITS = #{record.units,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STANDARD = #{record.standard,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMT = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_DT = #{record.createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPD_BY = #{record.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_UPD_DATE = #{record.lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCESSSTATUS = #{record.processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATERNAME = #{record.creatername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PRFRMDEPTNAME = #{record.prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROGRAMNAME = #{record.programname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update FS_PAYMENTINFO set PKID = #{record.pkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILLID = #{record.billid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYNOTESCODE = #{record.paynotescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOTALAMT = #{record.totalamt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRINTDATE = #{record.printdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYER = #{record.payer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENTBANK = #{record.agentbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYERDEPT = #{record.payerdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHECKCODE = #{record.checkcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECMETHOD = #{record.recmethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETIME = #{record.createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{record.creater,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYERBANK = #{record.payerbank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYERBANKACCT = #{record.payerbankacct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PERFORMDEPT = #{record.performdept,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYMETHOD = #{record.paymethod,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NOTESCODE = #{record.notescode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANKRECDATE = #{record.bankrecdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BANKACCTDATE = #{record.bankacctdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTESKIND = #{record.noteskind,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ISPREAUDIT = #{record.ispreaudit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECFEEFLAG = #{record.recfeeflag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAYFEEMETHOD = #{record.payfeemethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGRAM = #{record.program,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNITS = #{record.units,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{record.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STANDARD = #{record.standard,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AMT = #{record.amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_BY = #{record.createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_DT = #{record.createdDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPD_BY = #{record.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPD_DATE = #{record.lastUpdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, AREACODE = #{record.areacode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESSSTATUS = #{record.processstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATERNAME = #{record.creatername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRFRMDEPTNAME = #{record.prfrmdeptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROGRAMNAME = #{record.programname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select pfm.deptname as prfrmdeptname ,man.manname as creatername ,prgm.programname ,pay.pkid,pay. billid,pay.paynotescode,pay.totalamt,pay.printdate,pay.payer,pay.agentbank,pay.payerdept,pay.checkcode ,pay.recmethod,pay.remark,pay.createtime,pay.creater,pay.payerbank,pay.payerbankacct,pay.performdept ,pay.paymethod,pay.notescode,pay.bankrecdate,pay.bankacctdate ,pay.noteskind,pay.ispreaudit,pay.recfeeflag,pay.payfeemethod ,pay.program,pay.units,pay.amount,pay.standard,pay.amt,pay.version ,pay.created_by,pay.created_dt,pay.last_upd_by,pay.last_upd_date,pay.areacode ,pay.processstatus from fs_paymentinfo pay left join fs_base_programinfo prgm on pay.program=prgm.programcode left join fs_base_performdept pfm on pay.performdept = pfm.deptcode left join fs_base_mkvchmaninfo man on pay.creater = man.mancode where pay.paynotescode = #{paynotescd}

select unique pay.paynotescode ,pay.payer ,pay.performdept ,pd.deptname as prfrmdeptname ,pay.totalamt ,pay.recfeeflag ,pay.notescode ,pay.checkcode ,pay.processstatus from fs_paymentinfo pay left join fs_base_performdept pd on pay.performdept = pd.deptcode where pay.processstatus in
#{processstsAry}
